column5: Well the project is coming along very nicely.  It is pretty much completed on the exterior at this point.  Still left to do is the electrical, insulating and finishing of the interior.  I really like the idea of those rod holders, I'll probably be adding something like that for sure Pigeontroller.  The next step is going to be finding a suitable tow vehicle (Pickup 4x4 V8) and then of course ordering the boat!  I'm very pleased so far!  Tony
Coming along nicely Tony  don't forget the driveway though  maureen
is that place for rent?? when can i move in?  nice work tony

Nice work Tony.  . I second  the overhead rod storage idea. Consider Skylites, sounds silly but when I built my garage 3 years ago I put 2 in I got from Home Depot, they were about $300 each...At the time I questioned the idea, but after they were in I realized how nice it is to have some natural light!
